entry.title: Ukrainians Suffer Fuel Shortages After Russian Strikes
entry.content: About two dozen civilians were evacuated from the besieged steel plant in Mariupol, while elsewhere Ukrainians faced shortages of gasoline following Moscow’s recent assault on the country’s oil refineries and storage depots.

entry.title: Citizens' Images of Potential War Crimes in Ukraine Might Not Hold Up in Court
entry.content: Civilian efforts to document alleged war crimes have helped keep the world’s attention on Ukraine, but it remains an open question whether any of the evidence will hold up in court.
